title: I can't reconnect to chat (Mac)
body: So yeah, i just got chat restricted yesterday because I'm a toxic r%%%%%, and today I wanted to play some games with my friends but I couldn't reconnect to chat. i tried for 10 minutes. I have no idea what to do. I'm playing on Mac because my computer broke down and I'm broke. Help me please c:

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time reaching the PvP.net chat service. Since local network settings are the biggest factor that affects this, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) to ensure your settings are compatible.

Let me know if those steps helped.
is this some penalty Riot has given me for being toxic or is this just a coincidence?
